title: Drawing, "Design for a spot for The New Yorker, Lady buying a fur piece", ca. 1940
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, on scarf: M.
description: Woman in sleeveless print dress with large black hat and white cloves dickering with salesman over two skin sable scarf.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a spot for The New Yorker, Lady buying a fur piece", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Pen and black ink on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-5.
